events.message: I recently received my order but I am not satisfied with the product and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been reviewed and categorized under refund requests based on the customer’s expressed desire for money back.
The support representative Sarah has been assigned to handle the customer's refund inquiry.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m here to assist you with your refund request and help resolve this issue quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason you would like a refund to help us process your request?
The order number is 123456789, and I want a refund because the item did not meet my expectations and was different from what was advertised.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated the refund process and you should receive the money back within 5-7 business days.
That sounds good, I appreciate the quick response and look forward to receiving my refund soon.
Your refund request is now complete, and the transaction has been processed successfully on our end.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your issue appears resolved, we will now close this case. Thank you for reaching out to us.
Please take a moment to fill out our customer satisfaction survey regarding your recent support experience.
